title: 실리콘밸리 슈퍼스타트업 한국 오피스 Product Manager (Web application)
content:
주요 업무
        Establish a shared vision across the company by building consensus on priorities leading to product executionUnderstand markets, competition and customer/user requirements in depthIntegrate usability studies, research and market analysis into product requirements to enhance user satisfactionIdentify necessary reports, metrics, and analysis to measure the effectiveness and validate the success of completed projectsWork collaboratively with the Design team

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          product-management
          UI/UX 설계
          analytics

채용 상세
        자격요건5 years of experience in Web Product ManagementBachelor’s Degree in Engineering preferredKnowledge of multiple functional areas such as Engineering, UX/UI and Customer SuccessPassionate about user experienceOrganizational and analytical experience
